AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country where the events are taking place, with a Constitution that protects residents from unreasonable searches and seizures
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico: country of origin for illegal migrants
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexican border: geographical boundary relevant to the case and location of the incident, reference point for distance
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Interstate Highway 35: highway leading directly to the border and passing through Laredo, Texas, common smuggling route with history of alien smuggling, where vehicles are usually traveling at higher speeds late at night
